Package ml.karmaconfigs.api.bukkit.reflections.hologram

Class PersistentHologram

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.karmaconfigs.api.bukkit.reflections.hologram.KarmaHologram
      • ml.karmaconfigs.api.bukkit.reflections.hologram.PersistentHologram
  • public final class PersistentHologram
extends KarmaHologram
    Persistent karma hologram, this will store the hologram data into a file to be loaded previously
